keywords: spacious, breakthrough, investment, prime, safe & secure neighborhood, wide roads, public transportation
description: A spacious 111 square yard land is available at a breakthrough sale price of Rs. 9,00,000  as a great investment opportunity in a prime location of the city. The land is located at Madhapur near suitably wide roads and in one of fastest growing locations of Hyderabad. It lies in a safe & secure neighborhood while being close to public transportation as well. The locality has excellent future growth prospects. The land has the number 40 within a gated layout and faces towards the east. This property has amenities like 24-hour security and badminton court.

It includes amenities such as large green area, restaurants and pre-school.
